name: thor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in Norse mythology (= ancient stories from Scandinavia), the god of thunder and the weather, who protected people and the land: Thursday is the fourth day of the week, and is named after Thor, the hammer-wielding Norse god of thunder.
More examplesFewer examplesIf we had been born Viking, we would be worshipping Thor, he said.Based on the mythological Norse character, Thor, the comic hero was created by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby in 1962.The wicked giant, a descendant of the Norse god Thor, discovered one day that one of his boars had been killed.Thor, a sky-god, was the god of law and order.
